meanings.sent1: The store's window display featured the new products.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured a famous celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The bright neon sign featured in the dark alley was quite eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: The painting featured bold colors that captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The movie theater featured a giant screen that made the film even more exciting.

meanings.definition: Having a particular feature or characteristic
meanings.sent1: The car featured a sleek design that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The smartphone featured advanced technology for its price range.
meanings.sent3: The cake featured a surprise filling that delighted the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The garden featured a variety of colorful flowers that bloomed all year round.
meanings.sent5: The house featured a cozy fireplace perfect for chilly evenings.

meanings.definition: To have a starring role in a production or publication
meanings.sent1: The talented actress featured in the lead role of the play.
meanings.sent2: The singer featured in the music video for the hit song.
meanings.sent3: The cat featured in the viral video showcasing its funny antics.
meanings.sent4: The athlete featured in the sports magazine for breaking a record.
meanings.sent5: The author featured in the newspaper article for their bestselling novel.
